Last French troops leave Niger as military cooperation officially endsThe last French troops deployed in Niger to help fight a decade-old Islamist insurgency in the Sahel left the country on Friday, sealing a withdrawal that has dealt a further blow to France's influence in West Africa. Fri, 22 Dec 2023 14:35:18 GMT M47AAC7ATFLF5CBWN2HFUV6FUM https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/load-french-troops-leave-niger-military-cooperation-officially-ends-2023-12-22/Reuters世界非洲
EU Commission to mediate on stalemate over Spanish judiciary councilSpanish Prime Minister Pedro Sanchez and the leader of the conservative opposition agreed on Friday to ask the European Commission to mediate an end to a five-year political stalemate over appointments to the body that names judges in Spain. Fri, 22 Dec 2023 14:29:32 GMT BUG5Z4JVRVP5ZPASUWGUH464HI https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/eu-commission-mediate-stalemate-over-spanish-judiciary-council-2023-12-22/Reuters世界欧洲
U.S. Treasury's Adeyemo says new Russia sanctions order puts bigger burden on banksU.S. President Joe Biden's new executive order strengthening U.S. sanctions against Russia will put new pressure on banks to ensure that their services are not being used to aid Russia's efforts to circumvent sanctions, U.S. Deputy Treasury Secretary Wally Adeyemo said on Friday. Fri, 22 Dec 2023 13:57:39 GMT RJRZMAZ4EBLCPB5Z4KCMFLTLMM https://www.reuters.com/world/us-treasurys-adeyemo-says-new- Russian-sanctions-order-puts-bigger-burden-on-banks-2023-12-22/Reuters世界
We won't let there be war with China, Taiwan VP frontrunner saysTaiwan's ruling party will not let war break out with China, but it is China that is to blame for stirring up tensions, Taipei's former top diplomat in the United States and now frontrunner to become its next vice president, said on Friday. Fri, 22 Dec 2023 13:46:56 GMT XG3T6G4DBZKNJKHHF4TH6F2WSU https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/we-wont-let-there-be-war-with-china-taiwan-vp-frontrunner-says-2023-12-22/Reuters世界亚太地区
Police launch criminal investigation into missing UK boy found in FranceBritish police on Friday said they had launched a criminal investigation into the alleged abduction of Alex Batty, a British teenager who resurfaced in France earlier this month after disappearing six years ago. Fri, 22 Dec 2023 13:44:25 GMT 4JBHWM2XWFJ5JEJAYRXHGCAMY https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/police-launch-criminal-investigation-into-missing-uk-boy-found-france-2023-12-22/Reuters世界欧洲
Pakistan ex-PM Imran Khan files nomination for 2024 national elections- GeoFormer Pakistani Prime Minister Imran Khan filed nomination papers for the 2024 national elections on Friday, local media Geo News reported. Khan filed his papers to contest a national assembly seat in his hometown Mianwali. Fri, 22 Dec 2023 13:37:26 GMT巴克BTGAQBPJVI2YA3GE4HMHUE https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/pakistan-ex-pm-imran-khan-files-nomination-2024-national-elections-geo-2023-12-22/Reuters世界亚太地区
Netherlands to deliver 18 F-16 fighter jets to UkraineThe Netherlands will deliver 18 F-16 fighter jets to Ukraine to help its battle against Russia's invasion, the Dutch government said on Friday. Fri, 22 Dec 2023 13:21:43 GMT 4BWOK5HRHFOLRGJWPFEIL4GLC4 https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/netherlands-deliver-18-of-16-fighter-jets-ukraine-2023-12-22/Reuters世界欧洲
Somalia, U.S. forces kill al Shabaab leader behind numerous attacks in region - officialSomali and U.S. forces have killed a senior leader of the militant Islamist al Shabaab group who had planned numerous attacks in Somalia and Kenya, Somalia's information minister said. Fri, 22 Dec 2023 13:21:13 GMT 73ULE5IFG5N6NFT4WAN4FADSWI https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/somalia-us-forces-kill-al-shabaab-leader-behind-numerous-attacks-region-official-2023-12-22/Reuters世界非洲
Polish minister visits Ukraine to present aid packagePolish Foreign Minister Radoslaw Sikorski visited Kyiv on Friday to present an aid package for Ukraine on his first official foreign visit, a ministry spokesman said. Fri, 22 Dec 2023 13:09:44 GMT CZ7O3UYQQZNZJMBWVUPNFCHLKU https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/polish-minister-visits-ukraine-present-aid-package-2023-12-22/Reuters世界欧洲
U.S. dual citizen taken hostage dies in Gaza, Israeli forum saysA U.S. dual national who was among some 240 people seized during the Oct 7 cross-border rampage by Hamas in southern Israel has died in captivity in the Gaza Strip, a group representing hostages' families said on Friday. Fri, 22 Dec 2023 12:52:30 GMT HOQMDILDEJPB5YES2TKGJB6MA https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/us-dual-citizen-taken-hostage-dies-gaza-israeli-forum-says-2023-12-22/Reuters世界中东地区
Ukraine says it downs 24 of 28 Russian drones, debris damages granaryUkraine shot down 24 of 28 Shahed drones launched by Russia in an overnight attack that damaged residential buildings in Kyiv and an infrastructure facility and grain warehouse in southern regions, officials said. Fri, 22 Dec 2023 12:15:15 GMT TIXLT5Q3LFOARALILR6WWD64RI https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukraine-says-it-downs-24-28- Russian-drones-debris-damages-granary-2023-12-22/Reuters世界欧洲
